submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        X = horizontalCut
        Y = verticalCut
        m-=1
        n-=1
        res = 0
    
        X.sort(reverse = True)
    
        Y.sort(reverse = True)
    
        hzntl = 1; vert = 1
    
        i = 0; j = 0
        while (i < m and j < n):
        
            if (X[i] > Y[j]):
            
                res += X[i] * vert
    
                hzntl += 1
                i += 1
            
            else:
                res += Y[j] * hzntl
    
                vert += 1
                j += 1
    
        total = 0
        while (i < m):
            total += X[i]
            i += 1
        res += total * vert
    
        total = 0
        while (j < n):
            total += Y[j]
            j += 1
        res += total * hzntl
    
        return res
